Name: Last Soldier
About the game: The mission was a complete failure, you are the only survivor. You are trapped in a secret area where huge spiders inhabit. Now your goal is to stay alive. -Infinity level -Many enemies -Mini store system How to play: Click on enemies to shoot them. Click on coins to collect. Every 60 seconds will appear campfire icon and you can rest some time and buy provisions.
